scenario_text.value:
Stand aside and let us pass!
We have no reason to fight you!

I have no intention of stepping aside before
crushing your delusions.

I have no intention of stepping aside before
crushing your delusions.

They aren’t delusions.
Labramon protects me.

My heart calls out to protect her.
The same should be true for you.

They are not delusions.
Labramon and I are bound to each other.

I naturally want to protect her.
My bond with her makes it so!

They are not delusions.
I believe I am bound to Labramon!

You might not see it, but there truly is
a bond between us.

...And you still don’t understand why I say
it’s a delusion?

Stand aside and let us pass! We have no
reason to fight you!

I have no intention of stepping aside before
crushing your delusions.

Our faith is no delusion. Dobermon protects
me.

Of course I’d want to protect her. You should
understand how I feel!

Our faith is no delusion. Dobermon and me are
bound to each other.

Our bond can’t be seen by the naked eye, but
it’s there. Reason enough for me to fight!

Our faith is no delusion. My heart is bound
to Dobermon, I know it!

You might not see it, but there truly is
a bond between us.

...And you still don’t understand why I say
it’s a delusion?

Stand aside and let us pass! We have no
reason to fight you!

I have no intention of stepping aside before
crushing your delusions.

Our faith is no delusion. Cerberusmon
protects me.

I’d expect you understand a heart that cries
out to protect.

Our faith is no delusion. Cerberusmon and
me are bound to each other.

A voice inside me compels me to protect. That
idea shouldn’t be foreign to you, Garurumon.

Our faith is no delusion. My heart is bound
to Cerberusmon, I know it!

Our bond can’t be seen by the naked eye, but
it’s there. I’d give my life for that bond.

...And you still don’t understand why I say
it’s a delusion?
